tests.name: A: Handles SIGINT
tests.run: cd A; strace -e trace=signal -o trace ./signaling > tmp; ADDR=$(awk '/Address:/ {print $2}' tmp); SEC=$(cat trace | grep "sigaction(SIGINT" | grep -o $ADDR); diff -q <(echo $ADDR) <(echo $SEC) &>/dev/null

tests.name: A: Correct output
tests.run: cd A; ./signaling > tmp; tail -n 2 tmp > test-files/out.txt; diff -q test-files/out.txt test-files/test_1.txt &>/dev/null

tests.name: B: Executes calculator
tests.run: cd B; ./factorial 5 > test-files/out_1.txt; ./factorial 8 > test-files/out_2.txt; ./factorial 11 > test-files/out_3.txt; RES="    Calculator starting..."; grep -q $RES test-files/out_1.txt &>/dev/null && grep -q $RES test-files/out_2.txt &>/dev/null && grep -q $RES test-files/out_3.txt &>/dev/null

tests.name: B: Correct output
tests.run: cd B; ./factorial 5 > test-files/out_1.txt; ./factorial 8 > test-files/out_2.txt; ./factorial 11 > test-files/out_3.txt; diff -q test-files/out_1.txt test-files/test_1.txt &>/dev/null && diff -q test-files/out_2.txt test-files/test_2.txt &>/dev/null && diff -q test-files/out_3.txt test-files/test_3.txt &>/dev/null

tests.name: C: Opens files.txt
tests.run: cd C; strace -e trace=openat -o test-files/trace.txt ./lister &>/dev/null; VAR=$(grep -F "openat" test-files/trace.txt | grep -F "files.txt"); grep -F "openat" test-files/trace.txt | grep -F "files.txt" &>/dev/null && echo $VAR | grep -qF "O_WRONLY|O_CREAT|O_TRUNC" &>/dev/null

tests.name: C: Redirects stdout to files.txt
tests.run: cd C; ./lister > test-files/out.txt; grep -q "***Running child" files.txt &>/dev/null

tests.name: C: Restores stdout
tests.run: cd C; ./lister > test-files/out.txt; grep -q "Test complete" test-files/out.txt &>/dev/null

tests.name: C: Correct output
tests.run: cd C; ./lister > test-files/out.txt; echo "***Running child" > test-files/test_1.txt; ls >> test-files/test_1.txt; diff -q files.txt test-files/test_1.txt &>/dev/null && diff -q test-files/out.txt test-files/test_2.txt &>/dev/null
